name: Randolph InterGenerational Center (RICC)
vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info: Drive Up clinic - drive to back of community center - nurses will greet you at vaccine center trailers. You will be vaccinated in your car. Do not attend if ill, please wear your mask. If your 2nd dose bring your white vaccination card.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
